me_no_target: The one that you wish to serenade has left you to sing to yourself.
me_self: You sing a loud serenade to yourself.  What type of person are you?!
actor_room: $n raises $s voice to serenade the world.
me_room: You raise your voice in a loud serenade to your invisible love.
actor_other: $n raises $s voice in a loving serenade to $N.
actor_me: $n serenades you, you are swept away by $s voice.
me_actor: You raise your voice in a loving serenade to $N.
